children.value: In G6 V3.7.0 and later version, user are allow to use JSX-like syntax to customize the node by assigning the second parameter of G6.registerNode a string or function that returns a string.

The basic syntax is almost the same as the familiar HTML markup language, where you can use shape or group by a tag. At the same time, you need to assign the attributes for defining a shape. Style attributes are grouped to an object, whose items' value can be
, and others supported by JSON (note that it cannot be a function here, which will cause parsing errors).
Reference for the type and style of custom nodes:
Among them, for relative positioning, we newly added
to define the gap between the left and top.
Wrap the group tag on the outermost layer
When using JSX-like syntax to customize G6 nodes, the following tags are supported:
Use tags to customize nodes. All style attributes are written in style. Name, keyShape, etc. are at the same level as style, and the supported attributes are exactly the same as those in addShape.
: When using JSX-like grammar to customize a G6 node, the attributes in style do not support function. That is, the marker tag is currently not supported.
Using JSX-like syntax to customize a simple rectangle.

<rect style={{
    width: 100, height: 20, fill: '#1890ff', stroke: '#1890ff', radius: [6, 6, 0, 0]
  }} keyshape="true" name="test">
    <text style={{ 
			marginTop: 2, 
			marginLeft: 50, 
      textAlign: 'center', 
      fontWeight: 'bold', 
      fill: '#fff' }} 
			name="title">

</text>
    <polygon style={{
      points:[[ 30, 30 ], [ 40, 20 ], [ 30, 50 ], [ 60, 100 ]],
          fill: 'red'
    }} />
        <polyline style={{ points: [[ 30, 30 ], [ 40, 20 ], [ 60, 100 ]] }} />
        <image style={{ img: 'https://gw.alipayobjects.com/zos/antfincdn/FLrTNDvlna/antv.png', width: 48, height: 48, marginTop: 100 }} />
  </rect>
Using JSX-like syntax to customize a complicated node.

,
    fill: '#fff',
    stroke: '#1890ff'
  }} name="body" >
    <rect style={{
      marginLeft: 10,
      width:

<group>
  <rect style={{
    width: 100, height: 20, fill: '#1890ff', stroke: '#1890ff', radius: [6, 6, 0, 0]
  }}>
    <text style={{ marginTop: 2, marginLeft: 50, 
			textAlign: 'center',
			fontWeight: 'bold', 
			fill: '#fff' }}>

</text>
  </rect>
  <rect style={{ width: 100, height: 80, fill: 'rgba(24,144,255,0.15)', 
		radius: [0, 0, 6, 6] }} 
		keyshape="true" 
		cursor="move">
    <text style={{marginLeft: 10 ,fill: "red"}}>
